p: In the field, the adult dwarf wild type (WT) banana Aifen No.1 (Musa spp. ABB group) plant presented short pseudostems ranging from 2.0–2.5 m with the stem girth ranging from 95.5–98.5 cm. In addition, the bunch weight of WT was 15–20 kg. The identified Aifen No.1 mutant (MT) plant had a semi-dwarf stature with 2.8–3.5 m plant height, 92.5–95.0 cm stem girth, and a relatively heavier bunch i.e. 25–30 kg (Table 1; Fig. 1a&b).
